insurance services

Tradesheild offers Cargo insurance including: Open Cover and Single Shipment

  • Marine Cargo
  • Fleet Insurance
  • Warehouse

Marine Cover

Cargo insurance that provides blanket cover against loss or damage to all goods transported by a specific carrier, or by a specific shipper, during a certain period. Under its terms, the insured is required to periodically provide the insurer with the description, quantity, and value of goods shipped during that period.

Marine Shipment

Cargo insurance that provides cover against loss of damage to all goods related to a single shipment, the insured is required to provide the insurer with the description, quantity, and value of goods being shipped.

Open Cover

Cargo insurance that provides blanket cover against loss or damage to all goods transported by a specific carrier, or by a specific shipper, during a certain period. Under its terms, the insured is required to periodically provide the insurer with the description, quantity, and value of goods shipped during that period.

Single Shipment

Cargo insurance that provides cover against loss of damage to all goods related to a single shipment, the insured is required to provide the insurer with the description, quantity, and value of goods being shipped.

Warehouse Cover

Cargo insurance that provides blanket cover against loss or damage to all goods transported by a specific carrier, or by a specific shipper, during a certain period. Under its terms, the insured is required to periodically provide the insurer with the description, quantity, and value of goods shipped during that period.

Warehouse Shipment

Cargo insurance that provides cover against loss of damage to all goods related to a single shipment, the insured is required to provide the insurer with the description, quantity, and value of goods being shipped.
